question:
Consider the following states:
  1. Rajasthan
  2. Gujarat
  3. Jammu & Kashmir
  4. Himachal Pradesh
Desert Development programme was started in which of the above states?
explanation: Desert Development Programme (DDP) was started both in hot desert areas of Rajasthan, Gujarat and Haryana and the cold deserts of Jammu & Kashmir and Himachal Pradesh in 1977-78. The programme was reviewed by a technical committee and later it was extended to 1995-96, the coverage has been extended to a few more districts in Andhra Pradesh and Karnataka.
